resources.string: Wipe user data by factory mode
Click OK button will clear all user data, but retain the installed applications, suggest ordinary users do not use it, to avoid losing data in the phone
"This feature requires the support of the SD card, make sure that the available SD card inserted"
SD card is not enough space
"SD only remaining %1$sM available space, but this functions require SD card has %2$sM available space"

"This mobile device meets India's national SAR Limits. The India SAR limit for mobile devices is 1.6 W/kg averaged over 1 grams of tissue. Test for SAR are conducted using standard operating positions with the device transmitting at its highest certified power level in all tested frequency bands. The highest SAR value for your Lenovo device when tested for use at the head and body is outlined as follows:"
For more information, please consult the user manual.
